termsModal.title: Terms of Service
termsModal.introduction:
These Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as "Terms") set forth the conditions for using all features provided by Charactier (hereinafter referred to as "the Service").
Users shall use the Service upon agreeing to these Terms.

article1.title: Article 1 (Definitions)
article1.content1: 1. "Talk Tickets" refers to digital points required for sending chats with characters.
article1.content2: 2. "Premium Characters" refers to characters that are unlocked by paying an additional fee.

article2.title: Article 2 (Account)
article2.item1: Please enter the latest and accurate information when registering.
article2.item2: Creating multiple accounts by the same person is prohibited.

article3.title: Article 3 (Prohibited Activities)
article3.item1: Acts that violate laws and public order and morals
article3.item2: Acts that infringe on the rights of third parties
article3.item3: Unauthorized reproduction or commercial use of AI-generated responses
article3.item4: Unauthorized access such as reverse engineering or scraping

article4.title: Article 4 (Talk Tickets)
article4.item1: Users can purchase Talk Tickets through Stripe payment.
article4.item2: Talk Tickets cannot be transferred, exchanged for cash, or refunded.
article4.item3: Talk Ticket balance is managed in accordance with prepaid payment instruments (Payment Services Act).

article5.title: Article 5 (Premium Characters)
article5.item1: Users can unlock Premium Characters by paying the specified fee.
article5.item2: After unlocking, conversations are possible by consuming Talk Tickets without additional charges.
article5.item3: Unlock rights cannot be transferred, exchanged for cash, or refunded.

article6.title: Article 6 (Nature of AI-Generated Content)
article6.item1: Responses from the Service are automatically generated by AI and we do not guarantee their accuracy, legality, or usefulness.
article6.item2: The Service assumes no responsibility for any damage, trouble, or incidents arising from AI responses.
article6.item3: Users should use AI responses at their own judgment and responsibility.

article7.title: Article 7 (Fees and Refunds)
article7.item1: Payment method is credit card payment (Stripe).
article7.item2: Due to the nature of digital goods, purchased Talk Tickets and Premium Character fees will not be refunded for any reason.
article7.item3: If a monthly plan is introduced, users must cancel from My Page before the renewal date.

article8.title: Article 8 (Disclaimer and Damages)
article8.item1: The Service assumes no responsibility when unable to provide services due to natural disasters, network failures, or other force majeure.
article8.item2: If the Service's negligence is minor, the Service is not responsible for damages incurred by users arising from or related to use.
article8.item3: Even if the Service is liable, compensation is limited to the total amount paid by the user to the Service in the past 12 months.

article9.title: Article 9 (Changes to Terms)
article9.content:
The Service may change these Terms as necessary.
Revised Terms take effect when posted on this page.

article10.title: Article 10 (Governing Law and Jurisdiction)
article10.content:
These Terms are governed by Japanese law, and in case of disputes regarding the Service,
the Tokyo District Court shall be the exclusive court of first instance.

privacyModal.title: Privacy Policy
privacyModal.introduction:
Charactier (hereinafter referred to as "the Service") establishes the following Privacy Policy
(hereinafter referred to as "this Policy") to properly handle users' personal information.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.item2: Payment information (collected through Stripe; card numbers are not stored by the Service)
section1.item4: Chat content and input prompts to AI

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Use
section2.item1: Providing character chats, managing Talk Ticket balance
section2.item4: Responding to violations of laws and terms of service

section3.title: 3. External Transmission and Cookie Handling
section3.description:
The Service uses cookies and similar technologies to send information to third-party services
for convenience and usage analysis.
Disabling cookies in browser settings may prevent some features from being available.

ga4.name: Google Analytics 4
ga4.info: Cookies (_ga, etc.), IP address, page URLs

stripe.name: Stripe
stripe.info: Payment amount, email address, payment tokens, etc.

optOut.title: Opt-out Method
optOut.description:
GA4 tracking can be disabled using the Google Analytics Opt-out Add-on.
Other cookies can be deleted/rejected through browser settings.

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Disclosure
section4.description: Personal information collected will not be provided to third parties except in the following cases:
section4.item3: When providing to Stripe for payment processing

section5.title: 5. Personal Information Security
section5.item2: Important data is managed with minimal access permissions
section5.item3: Log audits based on internal policies

section6.title: 6. Requests for Disclosure, Correction, or Deletion
section6.content: Users can request disclosure of their personal information based on the Personal Information Protection Act.

section7.title: 7. Revisions
section7.content:
This Policy may be revised in response to legal changes or service content changes.
The latest content will be published on this page.

badges.title: Badge Collection
badges.autoAcquire: Automatically acquired when conditions are met

hints.startChat: Start with your first chat with a character
hints.buildAffinity: Build affinity by spending time interacting with characters

badges.modalSubtitle: Honor system that records your activities and achievements
badges.badgeDescription: Badges are special titles that record your activities and achievements on Charactier. You can earn various badges through conversations with characters, improving intimacy, and using the service.
badges.beginnerBadgeDesc: Badges for those who just started using the service. You can earn them by using basic features and taking your first actions.
badges.chatBadgeDesc: Badges related to conversations with characters. You can earn them based on message count, consecutive chat days, etc.
badges.affinityBadgeDesc: Badges related to improving intimacy with characters. You can earn them by reaching specific levels or building relationships with multiple characters.
badges.specialBadgeDesc: Special badges you can earn through specific conditions or limited-time events. Includes rare and valuable badges.
badges.autoAcquireDesc: Badges are automatically earned when you meet the conditions. You'll be notified when you earn one.
badges.progressTrackDesc: You can check the progress of badges you haven't earned yet. See how close you are to achieving them.
badges.rewardDesc: Some badges come with special rewards. (To be implemented)
badges.tip1: Continue chatting with characters daily to earn continuation-related badges
badges.tip2: Interact with multiple characters to earn a wider variety of badges
badges.tip3: Plan your intimacy growth to efficiently earn intimacy-related badges
badges.tip4: Use profile settings and service features to earn beginner badges
badges.notice1: Once earned, badges cannot be deleted
badges.notice2: Some badges may be available for a limited time
badges.notice3: Badge conditions and types may be added in future updates
